subject: Basketball
College Athletics
NCAA Basketball Tournament
lead_paragraph: Scottie Reynolds scored 23 points on Thursday, helping No. 11 Villanova finish a perfect season at the Pavilion with a 97-80 victory against Providence.
snippet: Scottie Reynolds scored 23 points on Thursday, helping No. 11 Villanova finish a perfect season at the Pavilion with a 97-80 victory against Providence.
